Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(init\): setup Vite + React + TypeScript with Notepad++ theme

- Initialize Vite project with React 18 and TypeScript
- Configure Tailwind CSS with custom Notepad++ dark theme colors
- Add Zustand for state management
- Create layout components: MenuBar, Sidebar, TabBar, StatusBar, MainContent
- Implement keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl+1-5 navigation, Escape to close
- Define TypeScript types for all modules \(Note, Habit, Task, Journal, Analysis\)
- Setup ESLint and TypeScript strict mode

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(modules\): implement all core modules with persistence

Command Palette:
- Ctrl+K to open, fuzzy search, keyboard navigation
- Navigation, Action, and Settings categories

Notes Module:
- CRUD operations with auto-save
- Tag system and fuzzy search
- Line numbers \(Notepad++ style\)
- LocalStorage persistence

Habits Module:
- Daily habit tracking with streaks
- Category system \(health, work, personal, learning\)
- Checkbox toggle and streak calculation

Tasks Module:
- Priority system \(P1-P4, color-coded\)
- Filter \(all/active/completed\) and sorting
- Deadline support with date picker
- Expandable task details

Journal Module:
- Mood and energy tracking \(1-5 scale, emoji picker\)
- Date navigation with entry list sidebar
- Tag system for entries

All modules use Zustand stores with LocalStorage persistence.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
